results.name: The Bold Type
results.overview: A glimpse into the outrageous lives of Jane, Kat and Sutton, who are working at the nation s top women s magazine, Scarlet, while navigating their careers, identities and individual voices.

results.name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
results.original_name: Batman: The Brave and the Bold
results.overview: The Caped Crusader is teamed up with Blue Beetle, Green Arrow, Aquaman and countless others in his quest to uphold justice.

results.name: The Bold and the Beautiful
results.overview: Continuing drama combining romance and intrigue set against the glittering backdrop of Beverly Hills and the American fashion industry.

results.name: The Bold Ones: The New Doctors
results.original_name: The Bold Ones: The New Doctors
results.overview: The Bold Ones: The New Doctors is an American medical drama that lasted for four seasons on NBC, from 1969 to 1973.

results.name: Bold Venture
results.overview: Salty seadog Slate Shannon (Bogart) owns a Cuban hotel, Shannon s Place, sheltering an assortment of treasure hunters, revolutionaries and other shady characters. With his sidekick and ward, the sultry Sailor Duval (Bacall), tagging along, he encounters modern-day pirates and other tough situations while navigating the waters around Havana. Aboard his boat, the Bold Venture, Slate and Sailor experience adventure, intrigue, mystery and romance in the sultry settings of tropical Havana and the mysterious islands of the Caribbean.

results.name: Bold Journey
results.overview: A travelogue program broadcast by ABC television in the United States during the late 1950s, consisting of films taken by explorers and adventurers during their travels to remote parts of the world. The films were usually set up by an interview between a program host and the guest, who then narrated his film with the aid of helpful questions from the host.

results.name: The Bold Ones: The Protectors
results.overview: The Bold Ones: The Protectors is an American crime drama series that aired on NBC from 1969 to 1970; it lasted for seven episodes. The Protectors was part of The Bold Ones, a rotating series of dramas that also included The New Doctors, The Lawyers and The Senator. This was the shortest of the four series.

results.name: Bold Concert Series
results.overview: Bold Concert Series is a Canadian English language television series. Bold Concert Series debuted on March 29, 2009 at 7:00 p.m. EST on the Canadian specialty channel, bold.

results.name: The Bold Ones: The Senator
results.overview: The Bold Ones: The Senator is an American political television drama series that aired on NBC from 1970 through 1971, lasting for nine episodes. The series stars Hal Holbrook as Senator Hays Stowe.The Senator was part of The Bold Ones, a rotating series of dramas that also included The New Doctors, The Lawyers, and The Protectors.As a group of dramas, The Bold Ones was nominated for nine Emmy Awards and won five awards. It was also nominated for a Golden Globe for best Drama TV Show.The series was based on an earlier television movie, A Clear and Present Danger.

results.name: The Bold Ones: The Lawyers
results.overview: The Bold Ones: The Lawyers is an American legal drama that aired for four season on NBC from December 1968 through February 1972.

results.name: The Clarence Update - The Bold and the Beautiful
results.original_name: The Clarence Update - The Bold and the Beautiful

results.name: Sheikh hot and bold
results.overview: Inas El Degheidy is back to revive the Sheikh Al-Hara program again, as she hosts a group of prominent and famous personalities on the scene, in order to shine a light on big secrets in their lives and characters in a bold way.

results.name: Tears on Bold Eyes
results.overview: A story based on real events from the Egyptian spy files of an Egyptian intelligence operation against the Israeli Mossad, whose hero was in fact (Ahmed Mohamed Abdel Rahman Al-Hawan)

results.name: Channing
results.overview: Professor Joe Howe is a Korean War veteran who is hired to teach English at Channing College. The dean Fred Baker is his mentor as Howe is writing a novel about his experiences. They are frequently involved in the student s lives.Channing, a production of Revue Studios, aired during the same time frame as the first season of NBC s somewhat similar offering, Mr. Novak.
